name: Exquisite Cadaver (manonamora)
description:
Introducing Exquisite Cadaver, a surrealist Interactive Game.

cadavre exquis - a method by which a collection of words or images is collectively assembled, each collaborator adding to the composition in sequence, following a previously fixed rule.

You play as an aspiring writer, currently struck with writer’s block. You are going to meet at a café two of your closest friends : Renaud and Camille, both also involved in the artistic world. After catching up with them, they will propose to play a few rounds of Exquisite Cadaver. Hilarities ensues.

This game is based on the real-life game of cadavre exquis, a game invented by surrealist artists, as a new form of entertainment, in the 1920s in Paris. 

  • A short story mode introducing you to the game , and where you get to play the different positions of the game. The other items are randomized each round.
  • An endless mode, where you can play to infinity or only insert the type of words you want.
  • Playtime: 15mins
